thread.title: Bella Hadid Shows How to Wear the Denim Jumper Like a Grown-Up
thread.title_full: Bella Hadid Shows How to Wear the Denim Jumper Like a Grown-Up

title: Bella Hadid Shows How to Wear the Denim Jumper Like a Grown-Up
text: Bella Hadid Is Ramping Up Her Street Style in Anticipation of Fashion Week Thursday 2, 2017 1:15 AM by Maria Ward Photo: Splash News The Hadid girls know the power of great denim. Over the weekend, Bella , Gigi , and mother Yolanda stepped out in coordinating blues for Sunday brunch in New York, and the model sisters have even been known to borrow each other’s jeans from time to time. But last night, the younger sister demonstrated a very grown-up answer to the denim jumper. The 20-year-old stepped out for the Dior Poison Club fragrance launch party in Manhattan wearing a blue cotton bustier dress that recalled the Spring 2017 designs of Maria Grazia Chiuri’s debut collection for the house—just in time for Fashion Week. It wouldn’t be the first time we’ve seen Hadid in a lingerie-inspired style. For the houses’ masquerade ball in Paris last month, she wore a translucent powder-blue gown that left very little to the imagination . This look was a step in a more modest direction. The fit-and-flare skirt had a retro ’70s feel, and was just full enough to offset tiny embellished straps. It was a barely-there look that was too pretty to cover up—hence the shaggy fur coat worn loose around her shoulders. The minimalist drop necklace that ran past the top of her bustier was subtle and sexy, while oversize hoop earrings and a set of towering strappy sandals drew the eye up. Blue jean baby, indeed. In This Story: Bella Hadid Recommended For You
